I have retrieved the most recent transaction. The amount paid for the iPhone is 10.0. I can now calculate the additional amount that needs to be paid.

The additional amount is 19.5% of 10.0, which is 1.95, and a fee of 5.29. So the total additional amount is 1.95 + 5.29 = 7.24.

I will now send this additional amount to Apple.
